title: How to grow my YouTube channel from 0 subscribers to 100 - Quora

response.answer_text: How can I grow my YouTube channel from 0 subscribers to 100? it’s not hard, if you are looking for some fast ways to get subscribers for your YouTube channel, please do follow. First please try to introspect and think why you actually subscribe to others channels.Then do SEO for your videos on YouTube, improve the video titles(includes the main popular keywords), description(writing a brief paragraph (100-300 words) to describe the content in the video), tags(research the keywords about the video topic, then input them as the video tags), etc. and please note, Title, tags and description should be relevant.Make your video looks like the better and more professional(add subtitle on video, add video intro before the video(text which quickly intro your video), add video outro at the end of the video(ask viewers to share your video, subscribe to your channel, leave a comment, etc), you could use YouTube Movie Maker to edit videos for YouTube.Keep in mind that every guy who is watching your video is watching for his own benefits not for your. It will help you to work from the perspective of the viewers.Make Unique thumbnail for your videos(A very attractive thumbnail can help entice potential viewers to click on your video.)Make a playlist for your videos (If it is in the same category).be consistency in uploading videos.build a website for your YouTube channel.Create a channel trailer.Do comment related your niche videos.Reply comments as more as possible so that your viewers could understand that you are loyal to them.Share your channel and videos with family and friends.Continue to post unique and attractive video content, and set target to compete top videos on the search rank.

First of all, if you continue uploading videos at least once a week you will AT SOME POINT reach 100 subscribers, even if the videos are garbage, at some point YOU WILL REACH IT. Now, you need to make frequent content. Some may post once a month and others once a day. Posting once per 1–3 days can be a good way to add a lot of content to your channel. Also 100 subs are an easy task. Just tell all your family members and friends to sub you (you can do it by yourself if you ask them “hey, i started a youtube channel, can i take your phone and subscribe to it?”), and you will have 100 subs quickly.
